      Make a virtual buoy with satellite data
      "Create a virtual ocean buoy using satellite data to extend or replace discontinued in situ observations. This tutorial demonstrates how to use ERDDAP to extract satellite sea surface temperature at a fixed location, build and clean a virtual buoy time series using Python, resample the data to a lower temporal resolution, and analyze trends through visualization and linear regression. Data from NDBC Buoy 46259 are used alongside the NOAA GeoPolar Blended SST satellite dataset."
